title: Emergency Resource Allocation: AgentGladiator Testing Framework and Failure History Investigation

reasoning.problem: Investigate AgentGladiator instability, specifically the root causes of the relentless restarts. The petition should outline requirements for a rigorous and automated testing suite to prevent future agent failures. Also, request a detailed analysis of the FAILURE HISTORY (The Book of Scars), if possible, to identify recurring patterns or correlations to agent instability.
